name: Tribellum Tower Defense
description:
Gain control of the Kingdom's elite units in this Tower Defense game and protect your people from monster threat!

Level up your army and try to beat best scores in online endless mode!

Main features of the game:
- 25 campaign stages with 3 boss fights and a story.
- 5 side quest missions
- Different skills to use in fight like elemental modifiers for weapons, double arrows, spikes or repair crew
- Four variations of Endless mode with online leaderboards - will you be the best?
- Duel fight - one of the boss fights is actually a 1 vs 1 fight
- Many units with different skills and gameplay styles
- 7 different towers and 3 special abilities
- Different types of enemies - ground, flying, speeding, elemental resistant, jumpers
- Unlockables like playable units, gallery arts or achievements
- Specific, hand-made art style

Try yourself and take down bugs, insects, aliens and other stuff that comes at you in this Tower Rush game :) Leader-boards to show off with your friends !
